column5: PLEASE NOTE: Guest have been advised by the HOA as of 5-11-2017 to not use the balcony. They are in the process of repairs and want to put the guest and owners safety first! The condo is beautifully decorated. The pool located to the East of the condo is heated during the winter months. The unit has been completely updated. Master Bedroom has a King size bed, 2 twin bunks and a queen sofa pull out in the living room. The condo has a fully stocked kitchen, TV in bedroom, and WIFI.
